content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
The (impressive!) program for the Isabelle workshop at Nancy is online now:
http://www.in.tum.de/~nipkow/Isabelle2016/

Please consider attending ITP and the workshop even if you do not present a paper!

See you there

Tobias Nipkow
Larry Paulson
Makarius Wenzel
smime.p7s

From: Jasmin Blanchette <jasmin.blanchette@inria.fr>
The link above appears to be momentarily broken; it redirects to "http://localhost/Isabelle2016/". I get the same effect on two independent machines. I guess this must be a configuration problem with "www.in.tum.de".

The following link works:

http://www21.in.tum.de/~nipkow/Isabelle2016/

Jasmin

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
Thanks for posting the alternative link. The original one works again now.

Tobias
smime.p7s
